website_summaries.verdict: A high-end linen cabinet that offers a great addition in bathrooms of all sizes.
pros: Includes 4 drawers and a large cupboard
Consists of natural fiberboard that are waterproof and moisture-resistant
Stunning white finish ensures the cabinet will match the decor in a contemporary or classic bathroom
Can be installed in about 30 minutes
cons: Faux wood is thin and delicate
Very small in contrast to similar linen cabinets

customer_reviews.title: Complete an utter garbage did not even finish assembling it sending it back not worth $10
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of garbage I’ve ever seen. It is held together by wooden pegs, the faux wood is so thin and delicate that even unpackaging it to 2 pieces broke. Complete an utter garbage did not even finish assembling it sending it back not worth $10
customer_reviews.author: AMY FISHER

customer_reviews.title: ... read all the reviews before buying and I'm mostly happy. It was small compared to the chair in ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before buying and I'm mostly happy. It was small compared to the chair in the picture but the dimensions are clearly listed. I needed something this exact size so it is perfect. I wanted something with a door for towel storage and drawers for medicine storage. This is pretty much the only thing that fits all the things I needed so I am happy with the function of it. It was very easy to put together, and decent quality for the price. The only bad thing is the very strong chemical odor that is still lingering after a week. (I changed the knob to match the rest if my bathroom knobs)
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Astacio

customer_reviews.title: Need time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and color for my bathroom. It comes with a lot small item so Need time to assemble . The wood is great quality and heavy. I would buy again..
customer_reviews.author: gracemay

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple purchases from this company. I am really satisfied with this cabinet. Their products are easy to assemble and very durable. I would say that i have the best bang for each buck i spent. This definitely cheap piece of furniture can make any room looks simply better.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute
customer_reviews.text: The product came in packaged well. The instructions were easy to follow and took me an hour to assemble everything. The cabinet looks cute in person. However, the paint smell still remains. Nevertheless, it's a good cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: makkhay

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not high quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but took a long time to assemble. I had a professional handyman do it and it took him 3 hours! It’s also pretty light- the pieces are thin. It does look ok but really overpriced for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is more of a cream than a white or off white. Assembling wouldn’t have been bad, but there was one step in the instructions that was very vague and confusing, and ultimately frustrating. The quality is terrible. This thing scratched and scuffed with minimal friction. The back piece was the wrong size, so I had to leave it off entirely. One of the drawers split when the screw was screwed in and had to be thrown away due to not being able to fully assemble it with the split. I expect more for $99. I may have been less perturbed if I had paid closer to $30.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it together. It took some time though. Now the product doesn’t look bad, but the chemical smell is too much. I wanted to use it for some baby stuff and there’s no way I would put anything in it. I opened the window and put vinegar all over it and let it sit there for a week. The smell is still there. How do I even return this now? Do we have to reassemble it? So annoyed! Not worth the money. Hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in how thin the processed wood was. I hoped it would be more durable. I was also missing parts. The shelve pegs wer not in the box. The support pegs didn’t fit. They were all to small for the holes so I had to use glue to hold it together. I would not recommend. To spend $100.00 (approximately) you would think you would be getting something of better value.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy this terrible cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I deeply regret this purchase. Possibly the worst decision I have made from Amazon. Everything about this infernal cabinet is terrible. It is incredibly flimsy, the amount of pieces you must assemble with nothing but tiny exploded drawings ( no written instructions at all ) will make you cry, and possibly turn to strong drink. Which doesn't help much. Took me 2 days to finally get it fully assembled, and one side just popped off as I moved it into the bathroom and gently set it down. This thing has ruined two days of my life, and the ONLY satisfaction I will get out of the damn thing now will be running it over with my car. DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Allison Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little cabinet and fits exactly where I need it to go but I wouldn’t buy it again. I’m handy but these instructions were a little tricky. I got it no problem but there is no written instructions. It’s a series of drawings that are a bit difficult to decipher. The worst thing about this cabinet is that it smells of chemicals so strongly we’ve had to run the fan in the bathroom since we put it together. 48 straight hours so far. Like I said, it fits exactly where and how I need it to so I won’t be sending it back but I wouldn’t recommend it. The smell is a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted to store my essential oils in. I have plenty of room for the carrier oils, shea butter and coconut oil, as well as my bottles and jars. The product was not difficult for me to put together, (62 yo grandma). It took a while as I was interrupted by phone calls and making dinner. Not sure it would hold up to constant use, as the hardware and materials aren't really thick. But this should work fine for something to us for storage where it is gently used. Looks really much better than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: shari l hanson

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as some other reviewers mentioned, this cabinet has strong chemical smell ... causes me headache. I spread all the parts in my patio for 2 days before assembly, but the smell didn't fade at all. Assembly was easy for me. Took about an hour. I don't recommend this cabinet if youre sensitive to chemical smells. I originally bought this for kitchen pantry and dish organizing purpose, but because of this Strong smell, I only store items like bins and cans in this cabinet. I am afraid this smell transfers to my dishes and snacks. Seller should be aware of what kind of chemical used for this product and make sure it's safe!
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with final product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together. Pictures of the screws to use when and where could have been bigger, but it went together without a hitch. Instructions didn’t include when to attach the magnetic plate, but that was easy enough to figure. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: gagaoriginal

customer_reviews.title: 22 days and still out on my porch
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet arrived as promised, pretty easy to assemble, nice cabinet, the one problem I have is that the unit has a bad odor. I'm sure its from the finish used on it, so I put it out on my back porch to air out, because it was very strong in the house and could not tolerate it. It is now 22 days out on the porch and it still has the odor. Not sure what im going to do.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the size
customer_reviews.text: Well ... the cabinet is cute but the photo showing the comparison to the chair and cabinet is very misleading although deminsions are given , don’t go by the photo. I purchased this for my cosmetics thinking ok it’s a better deal than the ones at other stores, and after I assembled it I was surprised by the height . I won’t be able to fit all my cosmetics. I attached a photo showing it in comparison with a cabinet in my room along side my 5 lb chihuahua .
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! It is way smaller than the picture depicts. Also way overpriced. I normally leave positive reviews for items I purchase but I just couldn't do it for this one sadly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little cupboard my daughter has in her room for art supplies. Not terrible to assemble, takes a little patience but not impossible. Very sturdy and doesn’t take up much space. Very good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leaaaah A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but stinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my bathroom. I have to say... it stinks really bad. I’m not sure why but it does. I’ve had it assembled for a week now, and it’s starting to air out as long as you don’t open it. It’s the coating on the partical wood board used I suppose. If it doesn’t air out I’m going to have to use it in the garage. It’s pretty, and eas easy to put together , just stinks to high heaven!
customer_reviews.author: ♥ Melissa ♥

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions need to be a bit more helpful with detailed pictures. Did the metal magnet for the door go with the dimples in or out. Did the hinges go with the smooth side in or out, what do you do with the #3 bolts once you put them in place ( not your standard familiar but and bolt so not clear how they should be inserted and then what)....I even watched a YouTube for help and it wasn’t clear.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Yadon

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The directions were difficult to follow because all they had were diagrams, but once I figured it out was able to put it together. It is well made and I am very happy with it. But it is much smaller than I thought it was going to be but that is probably my error. Perfect for a bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Lingering chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This could be a 5 star review because the product is very well made, assembles beautifully, and is high quality materials...except it had a strong chemical smell when first opened, but there is still a chemical smell several weeks later. We bought this for a small bathroom and had to move it out due to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet has a horrible chemical smell. After assembly, we brought it inside and it made our home smell horrible. It's so bad that I put it back outside and won't be using it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David "BB"

customer_reviews.title: Small!
customer_reviews.text: The way they depict this product makes it look way bigger than it is. It's def not taller than a bathroom sink. My bad I guess for not paying better attention to the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dufresne

customer_reviews.title: The smell from the paint on the cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and was pleased with the look but the smell in the cabinet is so bad. What ever chemical they used in the paint on this cabinet is unbelievable. I had the cabinet outside for two days in the sun thinking that would help draw the smell out. Then I sprayed it with air fresheners and it still didn’t help. I had towels in the cabinet and they smelled horrible . I can’t have it in the house because the smell is so overwhelming. Really love the product just can’t get rid of the smell. Everyone that smells it is shocked that it’s so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This cabinet is very neat.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is very neat. It stores nearly anything and has a lot of storage area, so it saves space around the house. It can be put nearly anywhere, and was very easy to build. The white color and design is very beautiful. It was not complicated to put together, and tools were not really needed. It is very sturdy, probably can be used for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, and a little more
customer_reviews.text: From a storage/assembly standpoint, the product absolutely met expectations. From a sturdiness standpoint, it exceeded expectations. Two stars got knocked off only because there's an overwhelming chemical smell. I've sat it outside for two weeks (multiple heavy rainstorms, notably with near zero water damage which is a major plus to durability) with minimal relief. Bringing it inside and being in the same room with it gives me a massive headache, so outside it stays. 100% not what I intended to use it for, but it worked out nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet but takes time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love my little cabinet! It came needing to be fully assembled. Building the drawers and everything. However, the instructions were thorough and mostly easy to follow. It took me quite a few hours to fully assemble the cabinet, but I was delighted when it was finished. A great cabinet and so far pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, smaller than expected shelf area. The drawers are nice & deep. Took about 2 hours to assemble. Good instructions, sticker was missing on one panel, made it hard to know for sure for to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It takes while to assemble. There are lots of parts. It looks nice when done. I did add a crystal knob. It holds a decent amount. I have tons of products. I put it in my bathroom. There is an odor but it eventually goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I needed storage in my bathroom. Had certain specs to buy within. This is perfect for me. Holds all my lotions and hair stuff and what nots. Drawers are decent size and hold a good amount. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylyps

customer_reviews.title: This door is going to fly away on me
customer_reviews.text: This piece would’ve been fine, but it was missing a few screws and the magnetic piece that holds the door shut. The door opens unless I place something in front of it and it’s quite annoying. The directions were a little difficult to follow but I did get it assembled quite nicely. Except for the door.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: don't trust the picture
customer_reviews.text: item is cute but very small. specs are there but i thought maybe i was wrong because the pictures show it standing above the sink and there is also a picture with it set up near a window however these pictures are very false.
customer_reviews.author: ZBMARIE

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, will fall apart easily.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this cabinet, it's perfect for a small studio bathroom. It holds a lot of stuff but it is VERY LOW QUALITY. I have had to bang the parts back into place so many times. I just tried to move it and it literally fell apart. I used high quality tools and put it together correctly and it still is falling apart. I can't even move it! Like, what am I supposed to do???
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.  Look at my pics.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Several sections completely disintegrated when trying to screw it together. So cheap...but I had already put so much of it together that taking it apart to send it back would be a massive hassle so I’m stuck with it - which stinks. Also - it’s not a true white, it’s a dirty white and smells awful. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell in the wood
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a few months now it smells so bad that I can’t even use it do not buy this!!! I want a refund but I would have to take it apart and resend it it’s not worth my time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Gave up trying to assemble. I like puzzles but this thing is too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is cute, but small and it comes in a lot of pieces, takes long to assemble and the worst part it is that comes with a horrible chemical smell that is still strong a week later! I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembling instructions were not given properly. Even after assembling the product had such a toxic smell to it. We kept it out in garage for a few days to see if the smell goes away. But, ended up returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Parv Sibal

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I placed this in my walk-in closet to hold undergarments and socks. I bought two fabric cubes that (10x10) that fit perfectly in the cabinet part. Great storage!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Small and has a chemical smell that won't go away
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 7 months now and it still has an unpleasant chemical smell to it. It feels cheaply made and is also smaller than I realized, but I should have looked more closely at the measurements before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Its just alright. The shelve in the right side has nothing to secure it down so we just aren't using it in gear from pulling it out with stuff on it. The drawers are cool but honestly I would go to IKEA next time for what this thing cost
customer_reviews.author: jessica james

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: Took quite a while to assemble. It looks nice in my half bath, but the SMELL is HORRIBLE! Very overpowering chemical smell. I tried to wipe everything down with vinegar. It seems to be dissipating somewhat, but if it doesn’t get better, I might have to return it!
customer_reviews.author: JJSturm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for, for the right price. It was very easy to assemble. My biggest issue it's the smell. The box smelled HORRIBLE, and as soon as I opened it, the smell was even worse. I put the whole thing together and it still stinks. We're giving it up a couple of days, otherwise we'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: I found this super easy to assemble- and it’s sturdy and well made, Gave me all the extra room I needed for the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: We used this for temporary clothing storage for our granddaughter who was visiting for a while in our vacation home. With proper organization it actually holds quite a bit of "stuff." I assembled it myself and I am a "seasoned citizen" over 70.
customer_reviews.author: granni48

customer_reviews.title: Look around first.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bathroom. I like how it looks except there was a small nick in the wood and wouldn’t you know, that part shows. Instructions are horrible. I don’t think it’s worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Strong Materials Used
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectation based on previous reviews. The storage product looked good from picture. I was pleasantly surprised that it was smaller in person. Instructions were hard to follow. It took me 90min to assemble them including examining materials but it was a straight forward process. The storage product was built with strong materials. Overall, good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very very small. Check dimensions not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Well it is very very small. I bought it for work, for some more storage. Do think I can even put my purse in it. Maybe it can be used in a kids room. It’s so small it sit below the door handle. If it wasn’t a million pieces I would of returned it. I glad I didn’t spend a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble
customer_reviews.text: Predrilled holes are to big for the hardware to work on this piece. And because of that the product can not be assembled at all. Disappointed. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Not so Durable
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad buy. However, it was missing one small part. The small metal bracket that latches to the magnet in order to hold the door close. Not really worth making a big deal about I just put a screw in there and the magnet sticks to keep door closed. Lots of parts and not as durable as I thought. But for what I will use it for, it will do. I feel I could have gotten a better deal at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila J. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this cabinet for my kitchen. It was easy to assemble and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great little cabinet for our bathroom! It was super easy to put together. It’s extra storage for all of my cleaning and morning stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet.  Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shallow cabinet with lots of storage, and this it perfect. It was a bit hard to put together, but now that that's done it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chism

customer_reviews.title: JUNK. Doesn’t even deserve 1 Star.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst item I have ever received from amazon. I spent an hour and half following horrible picture instructions, just for it to fall apart when I went to move it. The materials are terrible, it’s put together using wooden pegs that are too small for the holes, leaving it with little that holds it together. Not to mention I was short wooden pegs. Just save your money, now I have a pile of trash that I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Trant

customer_reviews.title: Great College Dorm Storage-Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: After putting together an 8 drawer tower this was a piece of cake. All the pieces are labeled and the instructions are fairly easy to follow. It assembled with wood dowels and cams so it’s pretty sturdy. Not sure what the negative reviewer is talking about. GREAT VALUE for the money. My daughter is using it in her dorm so she put her microwave on top (that’s all that will fit) and the cabinet and drawers for some food. It’s not very big but will be fine. I was impressed with how well made this product seems to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: The smell...😷
customer_reviews.text: I had read about the smell but figured it wouldn’t last long. I was looking on the outside of the box to see if it noted the color of the cabinet as it looks more off white than white when I came across the stickers in the photo. Known to cause cancer😱😱How can they sell this? And it seems to me the same exact item Is being sold just under a different name is being sold just under a different name.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a bad odor
customer_reviews.text: Had to air it out for almost a month to get rid of the chemical smell. Not a bad product once you get past the stink.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect fit for my small bathroom. A friend had assembled it for me and didn’t have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mishi B

customer_reviews.title: takes forever to put together
customer_reviews.text: It’s very pretty and hold a lot of items just wish the drawers were taller and the shelves were wide enough to fit a towel. Takes 2 to 3 hours to put together the instructions are not the best I had extra parts and just put together what made since. The shelves are very narrow but it’s nice for price I would recommend for hair and beauty products but not towels
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Frick

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price and very easy to assemble! Looks exactly like the picture! I love it in my bathroom as extra storage and counter space!
customer_reviews.author: T. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Difficult!!
customer_reviews.text: This Product was Broken! Cheap looking cardboard on the inside! A corner was broken off! The box was also damaged it looked like someone Opened it tried to put it together and Gave Up!! Incredibly Difficult to put together !!! Would not buy again! Waaay too expensive for such cheap product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nickie Fierro

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It looks like a nice sturdy piece of furniture and it is. It is in my bathroom and fits lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Okay for child’s room.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was purchased to hold bathroom toiletries and makeup. I believe it will be better suited for a child’s room. Drawers do not glide nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MsCJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We use these as extra storage in a spare bathroom. Works perfectly for that. Small, but nice looking and sturdy enough. Not too hard to assemble with a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI TUCKETT

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to assemble and the screws and such don’t even hold up like they’re supposed to. The A’s are too small to hold anything together or just slips out. Complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey for what it is but, I feel they all are
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A bit pricey, has an oder that goes away after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.title: So weak, and low quality
customer_reviews.text: 1. Round type screws are broken easily. 2. Screw spins with no traction when drive screws on board. --> Very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Product went together easily and looks nice. Fit our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for granddaughters nicer then I expected for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smaller than it looked
customer_reviews.text: nice cabinet. well made. beautiful finish. way too small - read the dimensions - don't go by the picture
customer_reviews.author: RSWick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the headache
customer_reviews.text: Finally stopped smelling like paint after 5 months. Took hours to assemble. Does not come with instructions and the instructional video is hard to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not real wood
customer_reviews.text: Not real wood for the amount of money.Smell is really strong goes away after a mth or so...Fits nicely in my bathroom ...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small batheroom
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is the perfect piece to keep things organized and out of view for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: no body

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as expected but is good for what I’m storing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Donell Koch

customer_reviews.title: It is difficult to assemble and VERY cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend wasting your time purchasing this item. This item was VERY difficult to assemble and cheap material. I returned it due to these reasons. I wouldn't bother buying this item. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice cabinet! It was easy to assemble, and took about an hour to put together. The color is nice and fits in with color scheme of my home. It’s a bit smaller than it is in the picture, but it’s good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt gu

customer_reviews.title: Cute little cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute as a little catch all cabinet in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage, not so much the putting together
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, once it’s together. It was extremely tedious to put together. Make sure you have time set aside to do so, and some patience!
customer_reviews.author: Knjn

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: it's impossible to assemble and not of the connecting pieces fit.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues putting this together. No cracks or missing parts. I followed the instructions and love it!
customer_reviews.author: PhxVrgo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my tiny bathroom! Extremely easy for a single mom with no carpentry skills to assemble. Haha. Replaced my old plastic drawers. Looks so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Love the cabinet just too small for price point!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this cabinet to store toilet paper and such things for my bathroom. I don’t think it’s a $80 cabinet, I expected it it be a tad bigger & taller for that price. My opinion it’s worth $50 or so. I can use a second one but not for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to assemble but looks great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look cheap and hold up very well. Took me a bit of time to assemble but the instructions were very helpful. Put a couple of parts on backwards but it was easy enough to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Nazario

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Cute, very small, if I would not have had it somewhat together I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: misfit

customer_reviews.title: A pile of pieces
customer_reviews.text: At this point I have a pile of pieces. Will update if I ever get a set of instructions
customer_reviews.author: Andalusian W.

customer_reviews.title: a pain to assemble but just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It was a mess for me as female to assemble looking at pictures with 100 pieces laying around. I gave up after an hour and called a male, who did it with no problem. I'm not saying a female can't put it together; I didn't have the patience. It's just what I needed to put in a small bathroom closet.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for extra storage in my bathroom and I am very happy with this purchase. I was able to put it together by myself in just a few hours (though a second set of hands would be helpful when attaching the door). It is slightly smaller than I was picturing but holds much more than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this piece of furniture. Should have ordered another one the drawers are a bit small. Many pieces to assemble but I didn't mind that. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Stephanuccia

customer_reviews.title: Herbal tool storage
customer_reviews.text: matches my decor in my workroom, great for storing my herbal tools
customer_reviews.author: M H Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I like this cabinet for the bathroom, the dimensions listed for the product was a bit off though. It's a little smaller in person then in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Smell hasn’t gone away!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cabinet for over a month and a half now. It is cute but the smell is still awful. We allowed it to air out in the garage for over 2 weeks and to this day it still has a strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!
customer_reviews.text: I got my package today and I assembled it by myself. It is pretty easy to assemble but it did take me 2 hours. With help of others it may be faster to build but other than that it’s pretty sturdy and it hold my stuff great. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miranda

customer_reviews.title: The end justified the means.
customer_reviews.text: I like my little cabinet. It is perfect for a small bathroom. Great storage space. Hard as heck to understand assembly instructions! After I struggled with it all night, my husband got up the next morning, took apart all my labor and put it together perfectly. I was glad to have my new cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: bgmcphail1

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Bought for my daughter room. I think was a little expensive, but now the result is just like I imagine..and I I'm so happy with my purchase. Ps. Pay attention to the measures.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gil

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cabinet, crazy assembly. The drawer nob is very cheap plastic and does not match the white of the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Heather 1

customer_reviews.title: Measure it
customer_reviews.text: In pictures appeared taller then sink in bathroom it is not I should of used tape measure to be sure don’t make my mistake
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Smells funny
customer_reviews.text: It does take a little while to assemble you might scratch your head a few times. But it was a good product. Had a very funny smell out of the box. And smelled for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and no one to speak to
customer_reviews.text: I love this but im missing a whole side piece and there is no one to talk to in order to get it!!!!!! I need someone to contact me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or effort
customer_reviews.text: This product took a very long time to assemble and was much smaller than I anticipated. It is made of cheap materials and is not worth 80 dollars. I am very unsatisfied. It would be good for a female make up and stuff or q childs room. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Billy T

product_meta.title: HOMFA Bathroom Floor Cabinet, Wooden Side Storage Organizer Cabinet with 4 Drawer and 1 Cupboard, Freestanding Unit for Better Homes and Gardens Office, White
feature_bullets: 【SAFE AND BEAUTIFUL】Please see the product size before buying, thank you. Cabinet size: 22*11.8*32.3 inch(56*30*82cm). The floor cabinet is created by durable natural fiberboards for long-term use, environmentally friendly paint to secure no harm to your family. The finish is Ivory white and design is the newest, elegant and beautiful.

【MULTIPURPOSE】The floor cabinet storage with four drawers and a big cupboard. You can put in clothes, books in the drawers, bigger and higher things such as kitchen sets, wine in the cupboard . You can choose it for the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, and other occasions.
【CONVENIENT AND LARGE SPACE】The drawers and cupboard have reasonable design, you can easily open and close them. The storage space is large. Also, you could also place it at the top of this unit.
【WATERPROOF】The High-quality MDF( Medium Density Fiber-board) wooden material withstands the humidity of the bathroom and prevents moisture.

【EASY TO INSTALL】This cabinet unit is easy to assemble and all mounting hardware is included. You can do it through the instructions cost about 30 minutes. The last column of the picture show attach an installation video, you can follow the video to help you assemble this cabinet more easily.
